column1: For the top 3 test cases from part 1, please provide a description explaining why they are indicated as your most important.

column4: Description explaining why they are indicated as your most important.

column1: Verify Book a scan button is displayed via Home page
column2: Book a scan button displays on the Home screen in the Appointments section
column3: Displayed is Book a scan button in the Appointments section via the Home screeen
column4: The user needs the button 'Book a scan' displayed on the homepage in order to start booking a scan, otherwise they are potentially blocked from scheduling anything.

column1: Verify the page to Select your Scan is displayed
column2: After clicking Book a scan button, the Select your Scan page is displayed
column3: Displayed is the Select your Scan page
column4: The user is blocked from reviewing any current scan and/or selecting a new scan w/out this page being displayed.

column1: Verify on the Select your Scan page, the user is able to cancel and return to the Home page
column2: On the Select your Scan page, clicking the cancel button on the bottom of the page, returns users to the Home page
column4: The user needs a way to return to the homepage.  User may need/want to review already scheduled appointments, view report, invoices or their accounts before proceeding any further.
